items.sentence: I know that Tom and Mary studied French together.
I know that both Tom and Mary have been arrested.
Aren\'t you going to tell Tom about what you did?
As I said earlier, I don\'t plan to say anything.
As I told you before, I can\'t understand French.
Tom and Mary got married last year in the spring.
Tom and Mary have been friends since high school.
Tom and Mary have different philosophies of life.
Tom and Mary have finally decided to get married.
I pretended not to understand what he was saying.
I saw a young boy crossing the street by himself.
I sometimes hear my father singing in the shower.
I speak French almost as well as I speak English.
I think it would be better to tell Tom the truth.
The waitress set a glass of juice in front of me.
The weather forecast is not necessarily reliable.
The whole neighborhood was surprised at the news.
I know what you\'re thinking, but it\'s not true.
Would you like to go to the theater this evening?
Would you mind watching my suitcase for a minute?
